dashboard.title: Docker Swarm & Container Overview
dashboard.description: Overview of the most important Docker swarm and container metrics. (cAdvisor/NodeExporter/Prometheus)

panels.content:
#### Description
Mixed values coming from cAdvisor and node-exporter. As the integration with Prometheus has been done via DNS there are some missing features.

The dashboard should be updated once this [issue](https://github.com/docker/docker/issues/27307) is done.

The "Proxy" variable is useful to exclude the traffic generated by the selected services, assuming it's a traffic that routes the cluster traffic is useful to have it in a separated graph and exclude it from the generic network traffic graphs.

panels.title: Sent Network Traffic per Container (excluding Proxy)
Received Network Traffic per Container (excluding Proxy)
